CHAT.comment: TUAN ANH NGUYEN AND JOSEPH BOULAIS, Petitioners, v. IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:14 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MARTHA F. DAVIS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF EDWIN S. KNEEDLER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF MARTHA F. DAVIS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:14 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
